item.title: Guide to Thumbnails in Hugo
item.description: Thumbnails can be enabled easily by setting the thumbnail parameter in the frontmatter to an image such as "images/landscape.jpg". Make sure to copy the image the static/images/ directory. If put together, it will look like this (that’s in fact this post’s frontmatter): +++ author = "Hugo Authors" title = "Guide to Thumbnails in Hugo" date = "2019-03-04" description = "Guide to Thumbnails in Hugo" tags = [ "thumbnail", ] thumbnail= "images/landscape.
